ideas.headerImageDescription: Outlandish creations from pixelated unicorns to drumbeat waveforms to levitating tacos to buckets of rainbows.
ideas.gettingStartedText: A o mošwa go Scratch? Leka serutwa sa Go simolola.
ideas.gettingStartedImageDescription: An illustrated boy plants his flag on top of a freshly painted mountaintop.
ideas.activityGuidesText: Ke eng se o batlang go se dira ka Scratch? O ka leka serutwa go dira tirwana, itseele sete ya dikarata tsa ditogwana, kgotsa o lebelele Kaedi ya Morutabana.
ideas.animateANameDescription: Tlhama ditlhaka tsa leina la gago, ditlhaka tsa ntlha tsa maina kgotsa lefoko le o le ratang.
ideas.animateANameImageDescription: The name ANYA in all caps and blocked letters is poised to wiggle
ideas.animateACharacterDescription: Tlisa baanelwa ba ba tlhamilweng ba tshela.
ideas.animateACharacterImageDescription: An taco with a wand, wizard cap and flowing white beard floats enchantingly in low-Earth orbit.
ideas.makeMusicDescription: Tlhopha diletswa, oketsa modumo mme o tobetse konopo go tshameka mmino.
ideas.makeMusicImageDescription: Strings vibrate on an illustrated Gibson explorer.
ideas.createAStoryDescription: Tlhopha baanelwa, oketsa ka dipuisano, mme o neye kgang ya gago botshelo.
ideas.createAStoryImageDescription: A wizard beckons a traveling witch towards a distant castle.
ideas.chaseGameDescription: Dira motshameko wa go lelekisa moanelwa go bona dintlha.
ideas.chaseGameImageDescription: A happy interactive octopus passes over a star.
ideas.videoSensingDescription: Dirisana le porojeke o dirisa maikutlo a vidio a a okeditsweng.
ideas.videoSensingImageDescription: A virtual hand dodges a spurt of flame in an attempt to pet a dragon.
ideas.cardsTitle: Bona dikarata tsotlhe tsa ditogwana tse di phuthilweng
ideas.cardsText: Ka Dikarata tsa Ditogwana tsa Scratch, o ka ithuta go tlhama metshameko ya batsayakarolo, dikgang, mmino, ditlhamo le tse dingwe tse dintsi!
ideas.cardsIllustrationDescription: An assortment of fun, animated characters and objects leap out of a stack of cards.
ideas.starterProjectsText: O ka tshameka ka Sesimolodi sa Diporojeke mme wa di tswakanya go itirela ditlhangwa tsa gago.
ideas.starterProjectsImageDescription: An illustration of the Scratch Code Editor.
ideas.desktopEditorBody: Go tlhama diporojeke kwantle ga kgolagano ya Inthanete, o ka 1itseela app ya Scratch1.
ideas.desktopEditorBodyHTML: Go tlhama diporojeke kwantle ga kgolagano ya Inthanete, o ka 1itseela app ya Scratch1.
ideas.questionsBody: A o na le dipotso tse dingwe? Bona 1Dipotso tse di bodiwang kgafetsa1 kgotsa etela 2Foramo ya go thusa ka Makwalo2.
ideas.questionsBodyHTML: A o na le dipotso tse dingwe? Bona 1Dipotso tse di bodiwang kgafetsa1 kgotsa etela 2Foramo ya go thusa ka Makwalo2.
ideas.MakeItFlyDescription: Tlhopha moanelwa mongwe le mongwe mme o mo dire gore a fofe!
ideas.MakeItFlyImageDescription: The scratch cat flies over the skyline. Alongside a flying taco.
ideas.RaceDescription: Dira motshameko wa baanelwa ba babedi ba gaisana ka mabelo.
ideas.HideAndSeekDescription: Dira motshameko wa go fitlha le go batla ka baanelwa ba ba bonagalang le go nyelela.
ideas.FashionDescription: Dira motshameko o o apesang moanelwa ka diaparo tse di farologaneng tsa setaele.
ideas.PongDescription: Dira motshameko wa kgwele e e tlolatlolang e na le modumo, dintlha le matswela a mangwe.
ideas.PongImageDescription: A ball bounces off a digital paddle.
ideas.ImagineDescription: Akanya ka lefatshe le sengwe le sengwe se kgonagalang.
ideas.ImagineImageDescription: A girl stands proudly in front of a thought bubble as big as the Earth and as intricate as butterfly wings.
ideas.DanceDescription: Tlhama lefelo la mmino le metsamao ya mmino.
ideas.CatchDescription: Dira motshameko mo tshwarang teng dilo tse di wang go tswa kwa loaping.
ideas.VirtualPetDescription: Tlhama seruiwaratwa se se diragatsang se ka ja, sa nwa le go tshameka.
